documents.document: Very nice and Friendly hotel The hotel is located in a quiet neighborhood and has vey nice modern rooms and bath. Short walk to Batllo and Sagrada Familia. Short cab ride to Pl. Catalyuna. Very friendly hotel staff. Free Internet in lobby. Free safe in room. Did not have breakfast.I stayed in a single room 402 for 4 nights and paid Euro 80 + VAT per night. I would stay here again.
